item.title: OpsMan 2007 R2–Collation, Collation, Collation!!!!!!
item.description: So, recently I decided to take the plunge and upgrade to SCOM 2012. So, there were a few pre-requisites that I needed as per the prereq checker that is built into OpsMan 2012.

item.title: “Blue Wednesday”
item.description: Do you ever have those days where it just starts bad and gets worse? “Man Alive, what a day it has been and it is not over yet”
